title: GetEntry (Method)
text:
METHOD GetEntry : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the calendar entry in the Date_List-Property of this BACnet-Calendar-Object, which has index nIndex. Use
The function GetEntryCount, to be able to go through all entries of the Date_List-Property.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the entry to get.

rows.Name: entry
rows.Comment:
The entry specified by nIndex (filled after calling this
method).
